name: Match-3
description:
A Classical Match-3 puzzle game demo created in Unity.

Enjoy! :)

Updated: 15/ 09/ 2017 This new version contains: 
  • Special cubes -  to help you boost your points
  • Effects - to make your eyes twinkling with lights and explosions
  • Sounds - so you can annoy your neighbours 

DevLog

Special thanks to:
  •  Background music by zagi2 -  http://freesound.org/people/zagi2/sounds/237797/
  • Unity Asset - Sci-Fi Sfx by Little Robot Sound Factory
  • Unity Asset - SciFi UI Sound FX by Bright Shining Star
  • Unity Asset - Gem Shader by Unity Technologies
  • Unity Asset -  Particle Dissolve Shader Package by Moonflower Carnival
  • Skybox V2 (Nebula) Unity Asset from HedgeHog Team
  • Post Processing Stack Unity Asset from Unity Technologies
  • SF Intellivised Font Package from ShyFoundry
  • and Blender for the cubes :)
